gameview.sView

Class SMenuPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gameview.sView.SMenuPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SMenuPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The first panel. The user can chose between a new game, to load a game or exit the game
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Raphael A.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
